segments.text: I notice the girl standing there, just waiting for a cookie like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t seem to care that her brother is about to fall off that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s even paying attention to what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, and the stool is tilting backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like this is going to end badly for both of them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely oblivious to everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm she is while the kitchen is falling apart around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to regret climbing up there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, like she’s waiting for a show to start.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should warn her to step back before he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole thing is just a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
